title: Save $500 on the powerful M3 Pro MacBook Pro right now
content:
Macworld

If you’ve been waiting to upgrade your laptop, this is a great time to take the plunge. The M3 MacBook Pro is down to $1,499 at B&H right now, which means you’re saving $500.

In our 4.5-star review of the 14-inch M3 Pro MacBook Pro, we found this laptop hit just the right balance of price and performance that’s ready to tackle anything you need to get done, from basic work tasks and streaming content to photo and video editing. Even though it’s not the newest generation, the M3 Pro chip is an absolute beast, and the 18GB of memory ensures this machine will remain powerful and fast for years to come.

Of course, the MacBook Pro features a drop-dead gorgeous Liquid Retina display with ProMotion and 1,000 nits of sustained brightness, making it a joy to use in any lighting situation. It also comes with two Thunderbolt 4 ports, so you can hook it up to multiple monitors at the same time, charge it in a flash, or transfer files in a blink. Battery life is stellar as well, easily lasting throughout the day.

So while the M3 Pro MacBook Pro isn’t the newest model you can get from Apple, it’s certainly a very powerful device. At $1,499, this is an unmissable deal, so hurry up and add it to your cart.
